title: The Careful Use of Compliments
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: 'Yes he is. He lives just round the corner in Hope Terrace. He has a rather nice house which belonged to his parents before him.

title: The Careful Use of Compliments
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: It was not a long walk, and the road was quite empty. 'We'll be at his gate in a moment,'  said Peter,  pointing  down  Hope Terrace. 'That drive off to the right – that's him.

title: The Careful Use of Compliments
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: 'Well?' said Peter as they walked back along Hope Terrace.
